answers.answer: Ooh I feel you! I have a 6 yr old & a 4 yr old and those two pregnancies were wonderful & smooth im 36 weeks now & this pregnancy is HORRIBLE hang in there were almost at finish line
I feel the same way & all day today I've been sick & stuck in bed

Have you had your blood sugar checked?  That's way too much water to be drinking - it sounds like you have unchecked gestational diabetes.Did you tell your doc how much you're drinking,  and that you're still feeling thirsty?

Ive been checked already for GD, And it was negative. But, they said even with the test my bs is real low. Which i am hypoglycemic so i guess still with the pregnancy (which is strange). I asked about the water & dr said i am dehydrated & have been since the last apt 2 wks ago. ive been throwing up a lot recently and had the poops & with having the heat on he says thats why. I mean great he can tell me why but i feel like i cant fix it on my own. & if i go to hospital, it has to either be alone (at night) or with my daughter during day. Ugh, im just so frustrated
Are you drinking things like gatorade that have electrolytes?  Maybe dilute gatorade by about half and drink that instead of just water?
Im going to have my hubby grab some gatorade on the way home. Hopefully itll help. Ty

question: I'm 32 weeks & not only have I had a lot of issues with preterm labor but now, I feel sick all the time. Also tired all the time but can never seem to fall asleep at night. I feel really dehydrated & Idk how to fix it unless I go get an IV... I drink about eight 32 oz glasses of water a day...at least. Idk what to do anymore. But feeling this way & dealing with my 4 yr old is really making me not want this baby anymore ;(
title: I hate this pregnancy!
